title: Diamond Vanki - A Modern Twist on a Classic Armlet
materials: 18K Yellow Gold. Set with brilliant-cut diamonds
G-H color. Finished with a signature Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster and durability.
features: This Vanki armlet features a floral design center, flanked by intricate, geometrically patterned wings. The diamonds are expertly set in a pave setting, maximizing sparkle and brilliance. The design seamlessly blends traditional armlet aesthetics with a modern, lightweight construction.
occasions: or as a statement piece for festive occasions like Diwali or Ugadi. This versatile piece can also be worn with modern outfits.
description: This Diamond Vanki represents a fusion of traditional South Indian jewelry with contemporary design. Crafted with high-quality materials and expert craftsmanship, it is a durable and timeless piece. Its elegant design makes it a conversation starter.
